Text:
Yay!!! MVGroup!
You kind folks are exactly what the Internet was supposed to be about.
Many thanks for the consistently high quality and pertinent programming.  May all your torrents seed at 10:1 and may all your VPNs never leak.
Thanks. Everybody should see this. Even doctors are ignorant of the dangers they create by abusing antibiotics, let alone ordinary people.

Very high quality video/torrent description, thanks. 

It's not normal for free documentaries to be only available to UK IP addresses. Discrimination, anyone?

"Even doctors are ignorant of the dangers they create by abusing antibiotics, let alone ordinary people."

Yes, there's a massive shitstorm brewing. If we are able to continue discovering adapted antibiotics, fine, but I have the feeling Western science is hitting roadblocks and even regressing --- out of technical fields like computers, of course.
In any case I do admit I like the idea of Nature triumphing on Homo Sapiens technological and anthropocentric hubris through Evolution :)
